intro.short: Security engineer who turns messy telemetry into clear decisions—log analysis, endpoint hardening, email security, and cloud/identity controls.
lines: Security engineer focused on detection + hardening: SIEM/log pipelines, endpoint controls, and secure cloud/identity practices.
I build practical tooling (collectors, dashboards, scripts) and partner with teams to reduce risk and speed response.

Security Engineering: Log collection & correlation (Windows Event Collector, syslog)
